about_the_game:
Once upon a time there was a small dung beetle, and like most dung beetles it was hungry. Mushroom season was coming to an end, but there were still rosetops to be found, a favourite in the beetle community.

When morning came purple dung beetles flocked out of their homes dead-set on getting their tiny insect hands on the much sought-after treat. In the end, only one single beetle remained, and it just so happens to be the hero of our story. With its broken wings everything seemed doomed... But maybe there is hope left for a hurt, hungry, but inventive dung beetle?

Features:

  • Meet a whole cast of insects (and spiders) in a mildly challenging short adventure
  • Listen to a lot of insects, all bathed in the soundscape of a lovely sunny day
  • Meet one of natures unsung heroes: The dung beetle
  • Dance to an original soundtrack, composed for bugs and humans alike
  • Collect eight simple (and two fairly simple) achievements
detailed_description:
Once upon a time there was a small dung beetle, and like most dung beetles it was hungry. Mushroom season was coming to an end, but there were still rosetops to be found, a favourite in the beetle community.

When morning came purple dung beetles flocked out of their homes dead-set on getting their tiny insect hands on the much sought-after treat. In the end, only one single beetle remained, and it just so happens to be the hero of our story. With its broken wings everything seemed doomed... But maybe there is hope left for a hurt, hungry, but inventive dung beetle?

name: Dung Beetle Adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: TBA
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A short (and free) adventure game, where you are tasked with helping a hurt, hungry, but inventive dung beetle on its journey to find something to eat near the end of the mushroom season.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
